page.title: 13GOLDTHORPE CHURCH
page.content: Goldthorpe Church is one of the high churches in this district. Its denomination is{Church of England. } The congregation on a normal Sunday is about{20-30 people.} We have two priests, one called Father Marshall and the other is called Father Matthews. Father Marshall has been at Goldthorpe Church about three to four years now and Father Matthews has been here about a year. The parish has had about six priests; one who was old has recently died of a heart attack. The nave of the Church has the {Stations of the Cross}along the walls. The Lady Chapel has just been re-decorated and a new chapel called {St. Michaels}has just been built. A club called the 'one way club' will hopefully be started in{1987. }
